original_text: While David was in the desert, he heard that Nabal was cutting the wool from his sheep.
korean_text: 다윗이 나발이 자기 양 털을 깎는다 함을 광야에서 들은지라

sentences.original_text: While David was in the desert
he heard that Nabal was cutting the wool from his sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나발이 자신의 양에서 양털을 깎고 있다는 소식을 들었습니다
